properties.areaDesc: Michigan Waters of Lake Erie from Detroit River to North Cape MI
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 19 at 10:54AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
At 10:35 AM EST Sunday, the water level at Toledo was 23 inches
above low water datum, or 1 inch below the critical mark for safe
navigation. The water level will start rising again and should be
above the critical mark for safe navigation by early afternoon. The
water levels are currently oscillating up and down across the lake.
This oscialltion will decrease during the course of the day, so the
lake level fluctuations will be reduced.
